languages.text: "Наблюдение. Среди погибших единиц имеются редкие экземпляры высокофункциональных сервиторов. По традиции такие образцы даруются знатным домам, особенно близким к священному братству Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: [драфт] "Наблюдение. Среди погибших имеются редкие экземпляры высокофункциональных сервиторов. По традиции такие образцы даруются знатным домам, особенно близким к священному братству Адептус Механикус".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Наблюдение. Среди погибших единиц имеются редкие экземпляры высокофункциональных сервиторов. По традиции такие образцы даруются знатным домам, особенно близким к священному братству Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are the rare highly-functional Servitors specimen present among the attackers. Such specimen are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred Adeptus Mechanicus order."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are the rare highly-functional Servitors specimen present among the attackers. Such specimen are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred Adeptus Mechanicus order."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are the rare high-functioning Servitors specimens present among the assailants. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred Adeptus Mechanicus order."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are the rare high-functioning Servitors specimens present among the assailants. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred Adeptus Mechanicus order."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「観察。貴重な高機能サーヴィターの検体が期限切れの個体の中に混じっている。こうした検体は伝統的に、神聖なる帝国技術局に最も忠実な貴族家に与えられている」
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「観察。貴重な高機能サーヴィターの検体が期限切れの個体の中に混じっている。こうした検体は伝統的に、神聖なる帝国技術局に最も忠実な貴族家に与えられている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “正在检查。在报废的单位中检测到罕见的高智能型机仆。这种类型的机仆通常仅授予那些对神圣机械修会最为忠诚的家族。”
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “正在检查。在刺客中检测到罕见的高智能型奴工。这种类型的奴工通常仅授予那些对神圣机械修会最为忠诚的家族。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Observation : parmi les unités expirées se trouvent des servitors ultra-performants, des spécimens rares traditionnellement réservés aux maisons nobles fidèles à la communauté sacrée de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Observation : parmi les assaillants se trouvent des servitors ultra-performants, des spécimens rares traditionnellement réservés aux maisons nobles fidèles à l'ordre sacré de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Observación. Hay servidores de alto rendimiento entre las unidades fallecidas. Tales especímenes se suelen otorgar a las casas nobles más leales a la sagrada hermandad del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Observación. Hay servidores de alto rendimiento entre los asaltantes, quienes se suelen otorgar a las casas nobles más leales a la sagrada orden del Adeptus Mechanicus».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Beobachtung. Unter den verstorbenen Einheiten befinden sich Exemplare der seltenen hochfunktionalen Servitoren. Solche Exemplare werden traditionell den Adelshäusern überlassen, die der heiligen Bruderschaft des Adeptus Mechanicus am treuesten ergeben sind."
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Beobachtung. Unter den Angreifen befinden sich Exemplare der seltenen hochfunktionalen Servitoren. Solche Exemplare werden traditionell den Adelshäusern überlassen, die dem heiligen Orden des Adeptus Mechanicus am treuesten ergeben sind."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Gözlem: Mevta birimler arasında, ender rastlanan yüksek işlevli hizmetör türleri tespit edildi. Bu türdeki hizmetörler, kutsal Adeptus Mechanicus kardeşliğine en sadık hanelere bahşedilir."
languages.original_text: "Observation. There are rare high-functioning servitor specimens present among the expired units. Such specimens are traditionally bestowed upon the noble houses that are most loyal to the sacred fellowship of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Gözlem: Mevta birimlerin arasında ender bulunan yüksek işlevli hizmetör türleri tespit edildi. Bu türden hizmetörler, kutsal Adeptus Mechanicus kardeşliğine en sadık hanelere bahşedilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
